attributes.action: Open the Gigg lane access to Bury Cemetery to the public 7 days a week.
attributes.additional_details: My late grandfather spent the majority of his adult life petitioning to open the gates and I will continue to do this in his memory and aim to get the gates opened I believe that the gates should be opened To the public vehicles 7 days a week, the gates being open would make the cemetery more accessible and less congested at one entrance.
attributes.background: Bury cemetery Gates (Gigg lane access) is only opened to vehicles during a funeral ,the alternative entrance is on the other side of the cemetery making this difficult for the elderly/disabled to access Loved ones grave nearer the gigg lane entrance.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a matter for Bury Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
